short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides text context around names of Trump-supporting celebrities and politicians.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*July 18, 2016 - Updated with a bunch of new names!

This extension is designed to save you the trouble of checking on whether certain politicians, celebrities, and public figures have publicly professed their formal endorsement or any manner of support for everyone's favorite tangerine-tinted entrepreneur and/or potential totalitarian tycoon.

Inspired by this: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/millennials-to-snake-peop/jhkibealmjkbkafogihpeidfcgnigmlf

Statements of support are primarily sourced from Wikipedia (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Donald_Trump_presidential_campaign_endorsements,_2016).

I've tried to avoid the most common names. If yours has been unfairly included, please let me know.
